name: LangGraph
summary: A graph-based orchestration framework built on LangChain for building complex, agentic AI workflows.

case_studies.title: Definely legal assistant
case_studies.summary: Definely used LangGraph to design a multi-agent system to help lawyers speed up workflows.

name: Napkin AI
summary: A visual-generation AI tool that turns business text into diagrams and infographics instantly.

case_studies.title: Design cost reduction
case_studies.summary: User reported replacing a graphic design company, lowering design costs by ~94% and reducing turnaround time to near-zero.

name: MGX (MetaGPT X)
summary: A no-code multi-agent ‘AI Dev Team’ that builds and deploys apps, websites, dashboards and tools from natural-language prompts.

case_studies.title: Web app generation
case_studies.summary: Users chat to build and deploy websites, blogs, dashboards, and tools in any language without coding.

name: Microsoft AutoGen
summary: An enterprise-grade open-source framework for building scalable, multi-agent, event-driven AI workflows (with optional no-code Studio).

case_studies.title: Retail agent system
case_studies.summary: A production-style retail AI agent system was built with AutoGen to enhance customer engagement and operations.

name: CrewAI
summary: An intuitive multi-agent collaboration framework with role-based agents, rich integrations, and flexible deployment options.

case_studies.title: Gelato fulfillment automation
case_studies.summary: CrewAI integrated with Gelato to automate heavy data-mapping and integration work, accelerating fulfillment.

name: Beam AI
summary: An enterprise-grade agentic process automation platform that deploys autonomous agents to streamline workflows across functions.

case_studies.title: Avi Medical – Healthcare inquiry automation
case_studies.summary: Reduced patient response times and lowered handling cost by 93% by automating routine inquiries with Beam AI agents.

case_studies.title: Martech firm – Contact Processor
case_studies.summary: Automated natural-language email updates across multiple systems, eliminating manual delays for customer success teams.

case_studies.title: Quotation Generation Agent
case_studies.summary: Automatically identified products and model numbers and managed the quotation lifecycle, reducing manual errors.

name: n8n
summary: An open-source visual automation and workflow tool that supports integration with AI services to build flexible automation flows.

case_studies.title: Vodafone – Threat intelligence automation
case_studies.summary: Revolutionized threat intelligence workflows, saving ~£2.2 million with n8n-driven automations.

case_studies.title: Stepstone – Mission-critical workflows
case_studies.summary: Runs 200+ workflows; sped integration of data sources by ~25× using n8n.

case_studies.title: Supply chain AI agent
case_studies.summary: Automated warehouse order processing via email parsing; enabled supply chain analytics automation using n8n.

name: MiniMax Agent
summary: A high-capability autonomous AI assistant that can generate code, design, multimedia content, and deploy complex workflows from simple prompts.

case_studies.title: Netflix clone in minutes
case_studies.summary: Generated a working Netflix-style streaming web app from a single prompt, demonstrating end-to-end autonomy.

name: Pydantic AI
summary: A Python developer-focused framework for building production-grade AI agents using typed data models, validation, async support, and tool integration.

case_studies.title: RAG knowledge-base agent
case_studies.summary: Developers built a reliable retrieval-augmented agent with type-safe outputs and reduced hallucinations.

name: Agentforce (Einstein)
summary: Salesforce’s enterprise AI agent platform embedded within its CRM ecosystem, enabling agents to analyze data, generate content, and execute actions with governance.

case_studies.title: SDR outreach automation
case_studies.summary: An SDR Agent triggered by lead engagement handled outreach workflows, improving efficiency and conversion speed.

case_studies.title: Einstein Sales Coach
case_studies.summary: Provided in-context coaching and conversation reviews to help reps practice and improve sales performance.

name: SAP — Joule Agents (incl. SAP AI Copilot)
summary: A portfolio of embedded AI agents across SAP cloud apps (finance, sales, service, HR, supply chain) orchestrated by SAP’s Joule Copilot, grounded in SAP Business Data Cloud and Knowledge Graph.

case_studies.title: Bosch – Case classification agent
case_studies.summary: Replaced hundreds of manual routing rules with a prompt-driven agent in SAP Service Cloud, accelerating support resolution.

case_studies.title: Finance – Dispute & A/R agents
case_studies.summary: Projected up to ~30% reduction in dispute handling costs and improved collections by automating cross-functional validation and follow-ups.

name: Oracle — Fusion Cloud AI Agents
summary: Prebuilt and customizable autonomous agents embedded in Oracle Fusion Cloud (ERP, HCM, SCM, CX) to automate multi-step enterprise processes with source-cited responses.

case_studies.title: Oracle Finance – Reconciliation agent
case_studies.summary: Automated matching and variance analysis, reducing manual close effort; Oracle reports strong internal efficiency gains.

case_studies.title: Telecom – Support triage agent
case_studies.summary: Learned from historical tickets to classify and auto-respond to common issues, improving first-contact resolution.

name: Google Cloud — Vertex AI Agent Builder
summary: A general platform (no-code + Agent Development Kit) for building multi-agent, tool-using AI agents with rich connectors (RAG, Search, code exec, 100+ app integrations) on Google Cloud.

case_studies.title: Trip planning agent (demo)
case_studies.summary: Built a multi-step itinerary assistant that integrates maps, search, and preferences to autonomously plan travel.

case_studies.title: Contact center expert bot
case_studies.summary: Partner deployment that deflected ~70% of tier-1 queries by grounding answers in enterprise KB and CRM via connectors.

name: AWS — Amazon Q Agents (Business & Developer)
summary: Generative AI assistants for enterprise (Q Business) and engineering (Q Developer) that answer with citations and autonomously execute multi-step actions across 50+ integrated apps and AWS.

case_studies.title: Deriv – Enterprise knowledge assistant
case_studies.summary: Cut new-hire onboarding time by ~45% and accelerated internal Q&A by connecting Slack, Drive, GitHub, and web sources.

case_studies.title: Nnamu – Engineering acceleration
case_studies.summary: Reduced software feature delivery times by ~30% using Q Developer for code generation, testing, and reviews.

case_studies.title: Accelya – QA with Q Apps
case_studies.summary: Achieved ~70–80% effort reduction in test case generation using Q Business ‘Q Apps’ for automation.

name: Claude Agents
summary: Anthropic’s multi-agent system built on Claude LLMs, designed for safe, coordinated, and autonomous assistance across research, coding, and customer support.

case_studies.title: SK Telecom – Support agent
case_studies.summary: Claude-powered support handles millions of customer interactions with high accuracy and safety.

case_studies.title: Grafana – DevOps monitoring assistant
case_studies.summary: Multi-agent Claude system automates metric analysis and alert triage for DevOps teams.

name: Fly.io — Phoenix.new
summary: An AI pair-programmer environment that autonomously generates, tests, and deploys full-stack Elixir/Phoenix web applications from natural-language prompts.

case_studies.title: Real-time chat app prototype
case_studies.summary: Generated and deployed a collaborative chat application with authentication and live updates in one session.

name: Manus AI
summary: A fully autonomous multi-agent platform combining Claude and Qwen models, capable of independent goal pursuit, dynamic planning, and tool execution across domains.

case_studies.title: Social media management
case_studies.summary: Manus autonomously managed 50 social media accounts, creating coordinated content at scale.

name: Lovable.dev
summary: A no-code AI app builder that generates front-end UIs and basic back-end logic from natural-language descriptions, focused on rapid prototyping.

case_studies.title: Internal dashboard prototype
case_studies.summary: Created a multi-page inventory dashboard connected to Supabase in minutes via plain-language prompts.

name: PocketFlow
summary: A lightweight open-source framework (<100 lines) for building LLM-powered nodes and workflows with shared memory and multi-agent patterns in pure Python.

case_studies.title: Agentic coding prototypes
case_studies.summary: Used to prototype AI debate and multi-agent reasoning demos with minimal code.

name: Composio
summary: A middleware ‘skill layer’ providing 150+ prebuilt tool integrations, secure auth, and event-driven orchestration for AI agents across enterprise apps.

case_studies.title: SwarmZero – AI agent ecosystem
case_studies.summary: Used Composio to expand agent capabilities without scaling engineering headcount by plugging into multiple APIs.

name: IBM — watsonx Orchestrate
summary: A no-code/low-code enterprise AI orchestrator with prebuilt assistants for HR, Sales, Procurement, and deeper integration via IBM Automation suite.

case_studies.title: Procurement workflow automation
case_studies.summary: Orchestrated email parsing, SAP order creation, and Slack notifications for a global procurement team.

name: HubSpot AI Agents (Breeze)
summary: A suite of specialized AI assistants embedded in HubSpot CRM for sales, marketing, content, support, and social media workflows.

case_studies.title: ResellerRatings – Prospecting agent
case_studies.summary: Improved outreach email quality and response rates by automating personalized prospecting at scale.

name: Zendesk AI Agents
summary: Autonomous support bots within Zendesk that answer FAQs, perform conversation actions (e.g., refunds, lookups), and escalate complex cases to humans.

case_studies.title: E-commerce support automation
case_studies.summary: Resolved up to 60% of support tickets by automating order status checks, refunds, and knowledge-based answers.
